section.title: Performing SmartState Analysis on an Instance or Image
section.para: Perform a SmartState Analysis of a configuration item to get updated information. To analyze, a SmartProxy is required to have visibility to the instance's storage location and a provider so that a snapshot can be created.

procedure.title: To Perform a SmartState Analysis on an Instance or Image

step.para: Click the accordion for the items to analyze.
Click the Instance or Image to analyze.

Click
(Configuration), and then
(Perform SmartState Analysis) on the Taskbar.

important.para: SmartState Analysis for instances runs as a process independent from providers. For example, a successful SmartState Analysis of a host does not mean SmartState Analysis for instances will be successful. Ensure to enter credentials for the provider that contains the instance for the SmartState Analysis to work.
